entries.title: Ransomware has now become a problem for everyone, and not just tech
entries.description: Ransomware attacks have rumbled on for years and show no signs of slowing down. It's time we faced the threat head on.

entries.title: Your bosses sent you a lovely gift? A machine told them what to buy
entries.description: Can you really trust your boss to know what would make you happy?

entries.title: Microsoft quietly revealed a new type of AI (it may quietly petrify you)
entries.description: You always thought this might be possible, but when a famous company says it's done it, it adds a little more scariness.

entries.title: Southwest Airlines just insulted unhappy customers in a truly spectacular way
entries.description: There's a way to communicate apologies. Then there's this.
